info.name: HOTEL BOOKING SYSTEM API
info.description: This is a REST API for a hotel booking system where authenticated customers can create and mange their bookings, and hotel managers can manage their rooms and bookings that are made in each room.

item.name: USER
AUTHENTICATION ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a user signup to the booking service. It expects the following data:

| **PARAMETER** | **DATA TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| firstName | String |
| lastName | String |
| email | String |
| password | String |

##### Below is the response message for a successful request:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "User created successfully"
}

```

##### This endpoint lets users login to the system with the correct credentials. The table below shows the expected data and their types:

| **PARAMETER** | **DATA TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| email | String |
| password | String |

##### Below is the response message for a successful request:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Login Successful"
}

```

##### This endpoint logs a user out of the system and destroys their session.

##### Below is the response for a successful request:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Logout successful"
}

```

item.description: These are endpoints that let a user signup and login to the booking system.

item.name: READ ENDPOINTS
item.description: These endpoints return data for and about a user.

item.name: UPDATE ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a user make changes to their bio. It expects the following data: | **DATA** | **TYPE** | | --- | --- | | phoneNumber
| String of a valid phone number, including country code. | | gender
| Enum whose values are either MALE or FEMALE | | nationality
| String | | dateOfBirth
| DateTime | | profilePicture
| URL | | address | String | ##### Below is the response for a successful request to this endpoint: ``` json { "success": true, "message": "User details updated successfully" } ```

##### This endpoint lets a user change their language and currency preferences. It expects the followng data:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| Language | String |
| Currency | String |

##### Below is the response for a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Preferences updated successfully"
}

```

##### This endpoint lets users update their credit card information. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| number | String containing valid credit card number |
| cvv | 3 digit number |
| expiryDate | DateTime |

##### Below is the response for a successful request:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Credit card details updated successfully"
}

```

##### This endpoint lets a user verify their account. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| verified | boolean |

##### Below is the response for a sucessful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Account verification successful."
}

```

##### This endpoint checks if the password entered by a user matches their password in the database. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| currentPassword | String |

##### Below is the response to a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Passwords match"
}

```

##### This endpoints lets a user reset their password. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| newPassword | String |

##### Below is the response for a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Password changed successfully"
}

```

##### This endpoint lets a user change their email. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| email | String |

##### Below is the response for a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Email changed successfully"
}

```

item.description: ##### These endpoints allow an authenticated and authorized user make changes to their data.

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a user delete their account.

##### Below is the response for a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "User deleted successfully"
}

```

item.description: This section contains routes that an authenticated user can access. Users can signup and login to their accounts, and also update their data however they see fit.

item.name: BOOKING

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets users create a booking, The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| checkInDate | DateTime |
| checkOutDate | DateTime |
| numberOfRooms | Int |
| roomId | String |

item.name: READ ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a user access information for a single booking, specified by its id.

##### Below is an example response to request from this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Booking retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": "2aba505e-fd75-4e3d-9ca9-c18634fbabc2",
        "checkInDate": "2026-02-01T00:00:00.000Z",
        "checkOutDate": "2027-01-02T00:00:00.000Z",
        "numberOfRooms": 2,
        "cost": 10000,
        "roomId": "8bd1a07e-8827-4fd6-af1a-a8340ad4b458",
        "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
    }
}

```

##### This endpoint returns all the bookings a user has made.

##### Below is an example response from a successful request from to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Booking retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": "2aba505e-fd75-4e3d-9ca9-c18634fbabc2",
        "checkInDate": "2026-02-01T00:00:00.000Z",
        "checkOutDate": "2027-01-02T00:00:00.000Z",
        "numberOfRooms": 2,
        "cost": 10000,
        "roomId": "8bd1a07e-8827-4fd6-af1a-a8340ad4b458",
        "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
    }
}

```

item.description: ##### These endpoints expose booking data to authorized users.

item.name: UPATE ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a user update a particular booking's details, specified by its id. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| checkInDate | DateTime |
| checkOutDate | DateTime |
| numberOfRooms | Int |
| roomId | String |

item.description: ##### These endpoints let a user update their booking details.

item.name: DELETE ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a user delete a particular booking, specified by its id.

##### Below is the response from a successful request this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Booking deleted successfully"

}

```

##### This booking lets a user delete all their bookings.

##### Below is the response from a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Bookings deleted successfully"
}

```

item.description: ##### These endpoints lets an authorized user delete their booking details.
##### This section outlines all the endpoints that let a user create and manage their hotel bookings.

item.name: HOTEL
AUTHENTICATION ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a hotel manager signup to the booking service. It expects the following data:

| **PARAMETER** | **DATA TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| email | String containing valid email address |
| password | String |
| name | String |
| phone | String containing valid phone number |
| address | String |
| stars | Int |

##### Below is the response message for a successful request:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Hotel registered successfully"
}

```

##### This endpoint lets a hotel manager login to the system with the correct credentials. The table below shows the expected data and their types:

| **PARAMETER** | **DATA TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| email | String |
| password | String |

##### Below is the response message for a successful request:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Login Successful"
}

```

item.description: ##### These are the endpoints for creating and logging in to a hotel account.

request.description:
##### This endpoint returns an authenticated hotel's profile. Below is an example of a response for a successful request:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Hotel details retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32",
        "name": "Nicon Luxury",
        "address": "Garki",
        "phone": "+2349024245914",
        "email": "nicon@gmail.com",
        "stars": 4
    }
}

```

##### This is a public endpoint that retrieves a hotel's details, specified by it's id.

##### Below is an example response for a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Hotel retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32",
        "name": "Nicon Luxury",
        "address": "Garki",
        "phone": "+2349024245914",
        "email": "nicon@gmail.com",
        "stars": 4
    }
}

```

item.name: get all rooms in a hotel

request.description:
##### This endpoint returns all the rooms available in a logged in hotel.

##### Below is an example response for a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Rooms retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "rooms": [
            {
                "id": "8bd1a07e-8827-4fd6-af1a-a8340ad4b458",
                "kind": "DELUXE",
                "image": "https://imgur.deluxe.jpg",
                "price": 5000,
                "numberAvailable": 10,
                "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
            },
            {
                "id": "730d9754-95a6-4218-a91d-fea3781c0f73",
                "kind": "DELUXE",
                "image": "https://imgur.deluxe.jpg",
                "price": 5000,
                "numberAvailable": 10,
                "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
            },
            {
                "id": "3472d0ec-2d0a-4aaf-8301-2f18c5223f3b",
                "kind": "STANDARD",
                "image": "https://imgur.standard.jpg",
                "price": 2000,
                "numberAvailable": 4,
                "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
            },
            {
                "id": "3e4bd2d0-53b5-4816-a87a-a51ffd6125ea",
                "kind": "EXECUTIVE",
                "image": "https://imgur.executive.jpg",
                "price": 9000,
                "numberAvailable": 6,
                "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
            }
        ]
    }
}

```

item.name: get all bookings in a hotel
UPDATE ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets the hotel manger update the hotel's details. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| name | String |
| phone | String containing a valid phone number, including country cod |
| address | String |
| email | String |
| stars | Int |

##### Below is an example response for a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Hotel details updated successfully"
}

```

##### This endpoint lets hotel managers reset the password for their account on the system. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| newPassword | String |

##### Below is the response to a successful request to this endpoint:

StartFragment

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Password changed successfully"
}
```

EndFragment

##### This endpoint checks if the password entered by a hotel matches their password in the database. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| currentPassword | String |

##### Below is the response to a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Passwords match"
}

```

item.description: ##### These endpoints allow hotel managers edit details for their hotel accounts.
##### This section contains the endpoints for hotel managers to create and manage their accounts on the system.

item.name: ROOM

request.description:
##### This endpoint lets a manager create a hotel room. The table below shows the data it expects:

| **DATA** | **TYPE** |
| --- | --- |
| kind | Enum (STANDARD, DELUXE, EXECUTIVE, PRESIDENTIAL) |
| price | Int |
| image | String Url |
| numberAvailable | Int |

##### Below is the response from a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Room added successfully"
}

```

item.name: READ ENDPOINTS

request.description:
##### This is a public endpoint that returns all the rooms available in the system.

##### Below is an example response from a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Rooms retrieved successfully",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "3472d0ec-2d0a-4aaf-8301-2f18c5223f3b",
            "kind": "STANDARD",
            "image": "https://imgur.standard.jpg",
            "price": 2000,
            "numberAvailable": 4,
            "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
        },
        {
            "id": "3e4bd2d0-53b5-4816-a87a-a51ffd6125ea",
            "kind": "EXECUTIVE",
            "image": "https://imgur.executive.jpg",
            "price": 9000,
            "numberAvailable": 6,
            "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
        },
        {
            "id": "8bd1a07e-8827-4fd6-af1a-a8340ad4b458",
            "kind": "DELUXE",
            "image": "https://imgur.deluxe.jpg",
            "price": 5000,
            "numberAvailable": 8,
            "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
        },
        {
            "id": "730d9754-95a6-4218-a91d-fea3781c0f73",
            "kind": "DELUXE",
            "image": "https://imgur.deluxe.jpg",
            "price": 5000,
            "numberAvailable": 6,
            "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
        },
        {
            "id": "a14e89ef-8682-46e9-8700-be28058e1ca5",
            "kind": "DELUXE",
            "image": "https://imgur.deluxe.jpg",
            "price": 5000,
            "numberAvailable": 10,
            "hotelId": "da611f1c-da39-4bce-b5c5-dcc417e71f32"
        },
        {
            "id": "6a3da410-cb5d-4a95-969d-9fe50614fbc0",
            "kind": "DELUXE",
            "image": "https://imgur.deluxe.jpg",
            "price": 5000,
            "numberAvailable": 10,
            "hotelId": "b1e8fb99-da47-401e-9c73-9587ad7fb4f1"
        }
    ]
}

```

##### This is a public endpoint that returns the information for a room, specified by its id.

##### Below is an example response from a successful request to this endpoint:

``` json
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Room retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": "6a3da410-cb5d-4a95-969d-9fe50614fbc0",
        "kind": "DELUXE",
        "image": "https://imgur.deluxe.jpg",
        "price": 5000,
        "numberAvailable": 10,
        "hotelId": "b1e8fb99-da47-401e-9c73-9587ad7fb4f1"
    }
}

```

item.description: ##### This endpoint lets an authorized hotel manager delete a room.
##### These endpoints let authorized hotel managers create and manage their hotel rooms.
